channel.title: Awesome Blogs on thelastpointer
channel.description: Recent content in Awesome Blogs on thelastpointer

item.title: Awesome Blog: Dan Luu (danluu.com)
item.description: I found a great post at danluu.com. I strongly recommend it! The author explores player interactions from male and female perspectives. What I found captivating is the methodical, data-driven, scientific way he presented his findings. More of this please! His other posts are great too, and cover a wide variety of topics. Since then, I’ve been devouring his posts, and it’s all kinds of fascinating. It’s rare to find a blog so good, so I decided to write an endorsement post.
